question: What is the objective of National Youth Empowerment Scheme which is under discussion currently in Union government?
option1: To provide skill training to youth
option2: To provide institutional credit to youth for self employment
option3: To provide military training to youth
option4: To provide scholarship to academically strong youth
answer: To provide military training to youth
explanation: The planned National Youth Empowerment Scheme will provide military training to 10 lakh young men and women every year to instil nationalism, discipline and self-esteem.
